name: Outlook - GTX 690 Theme
description:
A transparent theme for Outlook with a GTX 690 as the background image (Make sure to turn on dark mode in Outlook for this theme to work properly!!!)

Primarily for personal use for easy syncing across devices.
additional_info:
27-3-2019 - 01:07 Made some additional changes which make things more readable and made the CSS "look" better

24-5-2019 - 09:32 More improvements and made things more readable

11-3-2019 - 08:57 Hopefully fixed rules for the inbox overlay part

8-3-2019 - 13:41: Fixed parts of the Outlook agenda 

8-3-2019 - 11:56: Fixed an issue where if you hover over someone's email their account preview with previous send e-mails and files would be fully transparent added a somewhat transparent black background now which makes it a lot easier to see the content

3-3-2019 - 14:54: Added background color for the moving e-mails and unwanted e-mails menu's
